$comment: Concepts found in an interview about diabetes. A concept document contains objects and series objects of type 'concept'. This document contains a summary of all concepts found in a transcription, as well as a series with the concepts found at each time-stamp. This example uses eContext library of concepts, but there are many other libraries as well, like IAB's Content Taxonomy or IPTC's Media Topics.

Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes Treatments

object.text: What role does a podiatrist play when it comes to diabetes management and care?

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes Treatments
Health::Healthcare Services::Podiatry Services::Podiatry Professionals::Podiatrists

object.text: Well, podiatrists specialize in the diagnosis, prevention and treatment of conditions that affect the foot, ankle and lower leg.

objectCategory.class: Health::Healthcare Products::Healthcare Products [No System Specified]::Healthcare Products [No Condition Specified]::Healthcare Products [No Treatment Specified]::Foot Care Products
Health::Healthcare Services::Podiatry Services::Podiatry Professionals::Podiatrists

object.text: And diabetics end up with a lot of problems in the foot potentially.

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Musculoskeletal System Conditions & Information::Musculoskeletal Conditions & Information [No Anatomy Specified]::Musculoskeletal Leg & Foot Conditions & Information
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes

object.text: So the role of the podiatrist is really to identify problems before they become a major issue by routine diabetic foot checks, maintaining nail care and counseling the diabetics on proper shoe gear, and then, of course, treating wounds or problems as they may arise.

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes Treatments
Health::Healthcare Products::Endocrine System Products::Diabetic Products::Diabetic Foot & Leg Care Products::Diabetic Shoes
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Health Conditions & Treatments [No System Specified]::Emergency & Trauma::Injuries::Wound Care Treatments
Apparel::Footwear::Footwear [No Form Specified]::Footwear Parts & Accessories::Shoe Polish & Care
Health::Healthcare Products::Healthcare Products [No System Specified]::Healthcare Products [No Condition Specified]::Healthcare Products [No Treatment Specified]::Foot Care Products
Beauty::Nail Care
Health::Healthcare Services::Podiatry Services::Podiatry Professionals::Podiatrists

object.text: And Dr. Kim, how often are your patients surprised of this correlation between diabetes or between and and foot care?

objectCategory.class: Health::Healthcare Products::Healthcare Products [No System Specified]::Healthcare Products [No Condition Specified]::Healthcare Products [No Treatment Specified]::Foot Care Products
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes Treatments
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes

object.text: Well, very often it's surprising that diabetic patients aren't aware of the complications that can develop in their feet.

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetic Complications
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes

object.text: And so the astute primary care doctors or endocrinologists will send them to us.

objectCategory.class: Health::Healthcare Services::General Practice Medicine::Primary Care::Primary Care Physicians
Health::Healthcare Services::Internal Medicine Services::Endocrinology::Endocrinology Professionals::Endocrinologists

object.text: But sometimes we'll see diabetic patients with foot problems before they've even been diagnosed with diabetes.

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes Diagnostic Procedures
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes

Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Musculoskeletal System Conditions & Information::Musculoskeletal Conditions & Information [No Anatomy Specified]::Musculoskeletal Leg & Foot Conditions & Information

object.text: They'll present with numbness or pain in their feet or clot occasion symptoms, cramping in their legs or feet related to peripheral arterial disease.

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Musculoskeletal System Conditions & Information::Musculoskeletal Conditions & Information [No Anatomy Specified]::Musculoskeletal Leg & Foot Conditions & Information::Leg & Foot Pain
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Circulatory System Conditions & Information::Cardiovascular System::Cardiovascular Conditions & Information::Peripheral Vascular Disease
Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Musculoskeletal System Conditions & Information::Muscles::Muscle Conditions & Information::Muscle Cramps

Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Nervous System Conditions & Information::Nervous System Conditions & Information [No Anatomy Specified]::Nervous System Conditions & Information [No Disorder Specified]::Numb Feet

object.text: And these things are actually manifestations of their undiagnosed diabetes.

objectCategory.class: Health::Health Conditions & Treatments::Endocrine System Conditions & Information::Endocrine Glands::Pancreas::Diabetes
